main event: Deputy Sheriff observed three bright, steady lights that appeared to be moving but remained stationary as he approached. The lights eventually faded out and disappeared.
interesting points: The lights appeared to be moving but remained stationary as the Deputy Sheriff approached.
There was no object associated with the lights, and no evidence of any landing.
The lights were considered to be normal and not unusual for the area.
The sighting was reported to the U.S. Air Force as part of the Project Blue Book investigation of unidentified aerial phenomena.
The report includes a questionnaire with detailed questions about the sighting, but no photographs were present.
